niyojya karaka sabhapathi garu selwam adaikkalanadan, usas adhyapana ha mahamarga amathya saha parlimenthuwe sabhanayaka garu lakshman kirialla, sanwardhana upaya marga ha jathyanthara welanda amathya garu malik samarawikrama, prawahana ha siwil guwan sewa amathya garu nimal siripala da silwa, sancharaka sanwardhana ha kristhiyani aagamika katayuthu amathya saha idam amathya garu jon amarathunga, parlimenthu prathisanskarana ha janamadhya amathya saha aandu parshwaye pradhana sanwidhayaka garu gayantha karunathilaka, mudal amathya garu rawi karunanayaka, krida amathya garu dayasiri jayasekara, garu daglas dewananda, garu (mahacharya) aashu marasinha, yana parlimenthu manthriwarun saha parlimenthuwe mahalekam dabliw.bi.di. dasanayaka, karya mandala pradhani ha parlimenthuwe niyojya mahalekam nil iddawala, widesha katayuthu lekam asala wirakon yana mahathwarun shri lankawa niyojanaya karamin dwiparshwika sakachchawata sahabhagi wu athara,
